priority: P0 - Critical for Q2 2026 ACM AFT publication

arxiv_queries.query_string: cat:cs.CR OR cat:cs.CY AND (ti:DAO OR ti:"decentralized autonomous organization") AND submittedDate:[2024 TO 2025]
cat:cs.CR AND (ti:"on-chain governance" OR ti:"blockchain governance") AND (abs:voting OR abs:proposal) AND submittedDate:[2023 TO 2025]
cat:cs.CY OR cat:econ.GN AND (ti:"quadratic voting" OR ti:"conviction voting") AND submittedDate:[2020 TO 2025]
